channel.title: Black Mesa Animation Revamp Project(by IIopn)
channel.description:
He plan on revamp all the weapon in Black Mesa.
Of course I have his permission to post it here.
MP5: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O7htpmkGXts[/url] Spas-12: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7FwGV0kDSkY[/url] Glock: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=THV-A_ntvAw[/url] .357 Revolver: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=loRW_FAfLGw[/url]

item.title: Black Mesa Animation Revamp Project(by IIopn)
item.dc:creator: Chumbuster
item.description:
I need help getting the sounds for the glock reload and mp5 to work.

There is no sound for me

Everything else works fine

Solved **

Just had to change the “preload_file” “scripts/sound_weapon_M4.txt”

TO “preload_file” “scripts/sound_weapon_mp5.txt”

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa Animation Revamp Project(by IIopn)

item.description:
This might sound a little out of date (considering the last post was made 02-05-14, so technically I’m bumping even though I’m trying really hard not to.) Is there a way someone could replace the SPAS-12 shotgun with an Ithaca 37 Stakeout like the one seen in Aliens (1986)? I know it sounds a little stupid, but I would like to see a skin like that. :3

item.title: Black Mesa Animation Revamp Project(by IIopn)
item.dc:creator: Ronster
item.description:
I want to throw down a challenge…on a reskin

1680×1010 537 KB

How do you get that mettallic texture on the gun If anyone can chrome up the 357 or SW29 or even make the model a bit fatter like the original nose I would be interested with the black stock too.

But this is sexiest colt python model I have seen by An aggressive Napkin skin by jason9jason

The 3dsmax file can be found on game banana but I am not sure the skin is available.

Basically the chrome with phong shading I think it would be something special. And it is the only weapon that is a default weapon in the game that is missing from the animation revamp, but I really would not want the animation to change from the sw29 I think that is perfect, but I would not mind seeing the animation we have coupled with the rotating barrell on the model like the black mesa default model. and defo no glowing sights.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Animation Revamp Project(by IIopn)
item.dc:creator: Ronster
item.description:
yeah I know this but it makes the gun smaller and the hands are more or less the same size.

On the glock and the 357 this is more noticeable.

I want to change the camera position so the hands are at the same scale as when they hold the other weapons at the same distance or same fov. The hands for the glock and 357 to me look out of scale.

But the animation is great of course

800×600 114 KB

I wonder if it’s the two hands, unlike half life 2 single handed and different camera position

I would love to see single handed versions of the 2 pistols but i doubt that will happen

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa Animation Revamp Project(by IIopn)

item.title: Black Mesa Animation Revamp Project(by IIopn)
item.dc:creator: sourcegamer101
item.description:
Ronster:

How do you change the field of view on the v_hands?

I want to change the fov on the magnum and the glock

or perhaps it is the camera settings for the animation?

Navigate into the Black Mesa folder, then open up the ‘scripts’ folder. Scroll down until you see the ‘weapon_[x].txt’ text files. Open the text file of the weapon you want to configure and locate a line that says ‘fov’. Change the FOV from 54 to any FOV you want. If you are in-game and change this while it’s minimized, then you’ll have to relaunch the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Animation Revamp Project(by IIopn)
item.dc:creator: Dragunov2
item.description:
WorldsAblaze:

I hope he fixes the M203 grenade launcher reloading even when there is no more ammo. I wonder if he could possibly add an option in the menu which allows you to chose between the Mp5 or the M4, the .357 or the Deagle and the Glock 17 or the Baretta. That would be pretty cool

I don’t like this aswell, when the ammo is empty, it’s not possible to load another one. The same with the other guns using a visible ammo pack: Magnum, crossbow (when u have 3 arrows left, u see the animation load a complete arrow pack)

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Animation Revamp Project(by IIopn)
item.dc:creator: Open_Source_Forever
item.description:
I actually liked all the animations. My 1 gripe was the Smith & Wesson Model 29 that replaced the Colt Python. This is mostly an issue for me because it feels weird using 0.357 Smith & Wesson Magnum ammunition in a firearm chambered for 0.44 Remington Magnum (yes, there are many differences between the 2 ammunition types. Check the Wikipedia articles for more information).

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa Animation Revamp Project(by IIopn)

item.title: Black Mesa Animation Revamp Project(by IIopn)
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
I can live with the longer reload animations, but the draw animations really hurt it for me.

Quickly throwing a grenade is basically impossible because of them, and given the AI’s tendency to charge your position constantly, it makes any sort of weapon switching while fighting HECU a guaranteed loss of at least 30 health.

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa Animation Revamp Project(by IIopn)
